tool_description:
This API checks if the email is a disposable email. The API will match the domain with our 
3000+  disposable email domain list.
name: Disposable E-mail Checker
title: Disposable E-mail Checker

api_list.name: Check E-mail
api_list.description: Checks if the email is disposable email.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://disposable-e-mail-checker.p.rapidapi.com/api/validate-email"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "disposable-e-mail-checker.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://disposable-e-mail-checker.p.rapidapi.com/api/validate-email"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "disposable-e-mail-checker.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
